review: I've had apple tv's for several years and recently ditched them for the Fire TV hoping for a better experience. Boy was that a good idea! These remotes are WAY better because they're bluetooth and don't require line of sight (especially nice when laying in bed). Also, the overall functionality of the operating system provides a much richer experience. The back button, the home button, the menu button. I get that Apple wanted to keep their ATV remote simple, but it came at the cost of utility. Amazon got it right with the Fire TV. So much better! We now have two in the house.
